Name: Salty Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of large caperberry on pick.
Review: As the name suggests, fino sherry and caper brine add saltiness but this 'Salty Martini' also has a distinct nuttiness from the sherry. We'd suggest both a long stir for generous dilution, and serving with grilled almonds.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2009 by Salvatore Calabrese at Fifty in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Salty Martini contains 181 calories
